did.unittitle: United Nations Association of the United States of America, Huron Valley Chapter records

descgrp.accessrestrict: The record group is open for research use.

archdesc.bioghist: Local chapter of organization established to enhance United States participation in the United Nations and to strengthen the United Nations system as it defines and carries out its mission.
archdesc.scopecontent: Minutes, newsletters, published material relating to activities of the chapter; also other miscellanea of the Michigan United Nations Association.
